patthana16.77:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ upādānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho noupādāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.77:2.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.77:3.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ kilesaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nokileso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.77:4.1_0: Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
